total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows in the grid that contain the number 0.
Q2: For each row identified in Q1, replace all numbers in the row with 0, except for the number 2.
Q3: For each row identified in Q1, replace the number 2 with 0.
Q1: Identify the rows in the grid that contain the number 0.
Q2: For each row identified in Q1, replace all numbers in the row with 0.
Q3: For each row identified in Q1, replace the two numbers immediately to the right of the 0s with 0.
Q4: For each row identified in Q1, replace the two numbers immediately to the left of the 0s with 0.
Q1: Identify the rows in the grid that contain the number 0.
Q2: For each row identified in Q1, replace all numbers in that row with 0.
Q3: For each row identified in Q1, replace the numbers in the same positions in the row above and below with 0.
